Pre-Game Insights: Monank Patel will captain the USA side, with the presence of other experienced batters like Andries Gous and Aaron Jones.
Harmeet Singh, Saurabh Netravalkar and Nosthusha Kenjige are the key bowlers for the hosts.
Rohit Paudel will lead Nepal and will have support from other senior players like Sandeep Lamichhane, Dipendra Singh Airee and Sompal Kami.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both sides have met only once in the T20Is in the 2015 T20 World Cup Qualifier. The Nepalese side sealed a 122-run chase and won by six wickets then.
USA stunned everyone by reaching the Super 8 stage of the 2024 T20 World Cup. Interestingly, they beat Pakistan and gave a good enough challenge to India a well.
Recently, they emerged as the runner-up in the Netherlands Tri-Nation T20I Series and winners in the Namibia T20I series.
Others: The first fixture of the bilateral series will be streamed live on the FanCode app for Indian fans.
USA citizens can watch the game on the Willow app.
The Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas will host the entirety of the T20I series.
